about: Founding Engineer and Core Member of Technical Staff with extensive experience in architecting scalable backend systems, microservices, and Generative AI solutions. Proven track record of building 0-1 products, integrating LLMs, and leading technical initiatives. Proficient in Golang, Python,TypeScript, and Cloud Native technologies, with a strong focus on high-performance computing and system reliability.

projects.name: Genetic Algorithm Optimization
projects.description: Python implementation of Genetic Algorithm for multi-variable function optimization with contour plot visualization. Developed for MDO course.

projects.name: Airfoil Analysis
projects.description: Analyse any airfoil from UIUC database in xfoil and obtain results. Python-based numerical analysis tool.

experiences.title: Founding Engineer
experiences.description: Founding Engineer responsible for bridging engineering and product requirements. Architecting and building functional, scalable GenAI-driven systems from the ground up.

experiences.title: MTS - 2 (Software)
experiences.description: Core member of technical staff. Architected backend APIs for EV chargers (OCPP/OCPI) including discovery, booking, and OTA updates. Developed wallet and payment services. Recognized with 'Super Star Award' for exceptional quarter performance.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Interned at REVOS, contributing to the early development of EV charging infrastructure and gaining hands-on experience with backend systems.

experiences.title: Design Intern
experiences.description: Worked as a designer for a mini rocket motor static test pad. Designed a Static Test Pad capable of accommodating various high-powered rocket motors.

experiences.title: Aerospace Engineering Student
experiences.description: Specialized in Multidisciplinary Design Optimization (MDO). Applied computational methods to solve complex engineering problems.
